name: 14 Days
description: 14 days. You just need to wait inside for 14 days. It should be easy right? You have games, you have technology, you can talk to people with your phone, and your fortunate enough to be able to work remotely for the time being.  Play through the next 14 days in quarantine as you do fun tasks like brushing your teeth, play videogames, cook and eat food, text your friends, do work, clean up the place, go to sleep, and start it all up the very next day!!!... its just for 14 days.
